verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> And he heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> the words בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons לָבָן֙ <S%H3837><s%> of Laban's לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> hath taken away יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what לְאָבִ֑ינוּ <S%H1><s%> all that [was] our father's וּמֵאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what לְאָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> and of [that] which [was] our father's עָשָׂ֕ה <S%H6213><s%> hath he gotten אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכָּבֹ֖ד <S%H3519><s%> all this glory הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> beheld יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the countenance לָבָ֑ן <S%H3837><s%> of Laban וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold אֵינֶ֛נּוּ <S%H369><s%> not עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> toward כִּתְמ֥וֹל <S%H8543><s%> and behold it [was] not toward him as שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob שׁ֛וּב <S%H7725><s%> Return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲבוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy fathers וּלְמוֹלַדְתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H4138><s%> and to thy kindred וְאֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> and called לְרָחֵ֣ל <S%H7354><s%> Rachel וּלְלֵאָ֑ה <S%H3812><s%> and Leah הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> to the field אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <S%H6629><s%> unto his flock

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said לָהֶ֗ן רֹאֶ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> unto them I see אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> countenance אֲבִיכֶ֔ן <S%H1><s%> your father's כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that it אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <S%H369><s%> is not אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> toward כִּתְמֹ֣ל <S%H8543><s%> that it [is] not toward me as שִׁלְשֹׁ֑ם <S%H8032><s%> before וֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> but the God אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> of my father הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> hath been עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> against

וְאַתֵּ֖נָה <S%H859><s%> And ye יְדַעְתֶּ֑ן <S%H3045><s%> know כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> with בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֹּחִ֔י <S%H3581><s%> that with all my power עָבַ֖דְתִּי <S%H5647><s%> I have served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִיכֶֽן׃ <S%H1><s%> your father

וַאֲבִיכֶן֙ <S%H1><s%> And your father הֵ֣תֶל <S%H2048><s%> hath deceived בִּ֔י וְהֶחֱלִ֥ף <S%H2498><s%> me and changed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַשְׂכֻּרְתִּ֖י <S%H4909><s%> my wages עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> ten מֹנִ֑ים <S%H4489><s%> times וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נְתָנ֣וֹ <S%H5414><s%> suffered him אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> but God לְהָרַ֖ע <S%H7489><s%> not to hurt עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> me

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> thus יֹאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> If he said נְקֻדִּים֙ <S%H5348><s%> thus The speckled יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be thy שְׂכָרֶ֔ךָ <S%H7939><s%> shall be thy wages וְיָלְד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> bare כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> then all the cattle נְקֻדִּ֑ים <S%H5348><s%> speckled וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> and if כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> thus יֹאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> and if he said עֲקֻדִּים֙ <S%H6124><s%> thus The ringstraked יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be thy שְׂכָרֶ֔ךָ <S%H7939><s%> shall be thy hire וְיָלְד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> then bare כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> all the cattle עֲקֻדִּֽים׃ <S%H6124><s%> ringstraked

וַיַּצֵּ֧ל <S%H5337><s%> hath taken away אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> Thus God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְנֵ֥ה <S%H4735><s%> the cattle אֲבִיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of your father וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and given לִֽי׃

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּעֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> And it came to pass at the time יַחֵ֣ם <S%H3179><s%> conceived הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> that the cattle וָאֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> that I lifted up עֵינַ֛י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes וָאֵ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and saw בַּחֲל֑וֹם <S%H2472><s%> in a dream וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הָֽעַתֻּדִים֙ <S%H6260><s%> and behold the rams הָעֹלִ֣ים <S%H5927><s%> which leaped עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> when הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> upon the cattle עֲקֻדִּ֥ים <S%H6124><s%> [were] ringstraked נְקֻדִּ֖ים <S%H5348><s%> speckled וּבְרֻדִּֽים׃ <S%H1261><s%> and grisled

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake אֵלַ֜י <S%H413><s%> then מַלְאַ֧ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> of God בַּחֲל֖וֹם <S%H2472><s%> unto me in a dream יַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> [saying] Jacob וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> And I said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> Here

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said שָׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> Lift up נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> now עֵינֶ֤יךָ <S%H5869><s%> now thine eyes וּרְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> and see כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽעַתֻּדִים֙ <S%H6260><s%> all the rams הָעֹלִ֣ים <S%H5927><s%> which leap עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> upon the cattle עֲקֻדִּ֥ים <S%H6124><s%> [are] ringstraked נְקֻדִּ֖ים <S%H5348><s%> speckled וּבְרֻדִּ֑ים <S%H1261><s%> and grisled כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רָאִ֔יתִי <S%H7200><s%> for I have seen אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> all that Laban עֹ֥שֶׂה <S%H6213><s%> doeth לָּֽךְ׃

אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I הָאֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> I [am] the God בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> you מָשַׁ֤חְתָּ <S%H4886><s%> where thou anointedst שָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> in it מַצֵּבָ֔ה <S%H4676><s%> the pillar אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> you נָדַ֥רְתָּ <S%H5087><s%> [and] where thou vowedst לִּ֛י שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it נֶ֑דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> unto me now arise צֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> get thee out מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from this land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> and return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land מוֹלַדְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H4138><s%> of thy kindred

וַתַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered רָחֵל֙ <S%H7354><s%> And Rachel וְלֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> and Leah וַתֹּאמַ֖רְנָה <S%H559><s%> and said ל֑וֹ הַע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still לָ֛נוּ חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> unto him [Is there] yet any portion וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> or inheritance בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court אָבִֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> for us in our father's

הֲל֧וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not נָכְרִיּ֛וֹת <S%H5237><s%> alien נֶחְשַׁ֥בְנוּ <S%H2803><s%> Are we not counted ל֖וֹ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מְכָרָ֑נוּ <S%H4376><s%> sell away וַיֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> us and hath quite גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אָכ֖וֹל <S%H398><s%> devoured אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּסְפֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H3701><s%> also our money

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Surely כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֹ֗שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> For all the riches אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הִצִּ֤יל <S%H5337><s%> hath taken אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> which God מֵֽאָבִ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> from our father לָ֥נוּ ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> to us וּלְבָנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> that [is] ours and our children's וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> hath said אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> now then whatsoever God אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> then עֲשֵֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> unto thee do

וַיָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> rose up יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> Then Jacob וַיִּשָּׂ֛א <S%H5375><s%> and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֥יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָשָׁ֖יו <S%H802><s%> and his wives עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַגְּמַלִּֽים׃ <S%H1581><s%> upon camels

וַיִּנְהַ֣ג <S%H5090><s%> And he carried away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִקְנֵ֗הוּ <S%H4735><s%> all his cattle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all רְכֻשׁוֹ֙ <S%H7399><s%> and all his goods אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which רָכָ֔שׁ <S%H7408><s%> which he had gotten מִקְנֵה֙ <S%H4735><s%> the cattle קִנְיָנ֔וֹ <S%H7075><s%> of his getting אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which רָכַ֖שׁ <S%H7408><s%> which he had gotten בְּפַדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֑ם <S%H6307><s%> in Padanaram לָב֛וֹא <S%H935><s%> for to go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> to Isaac אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

וְלָבָ֣ן <S%H3837><s%> And Laban הָלַ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went לִגְזֹ֖ז <S%H1494><s%> to shear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנ֑וֹ <S%H6629><s%> his sheep וַתִּגְנֹ֣ב <S%H1589><s%> had stolen רָחֵ֔ל <S%H7354><s%> and Rachel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <S%H8655><s%> the images אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> were לְאָבִֽיהָ׃ <S%H1><s%> that [were] her father's

וַיִּגְנֹ֣ב <S%H1589><s%> stole away יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> unawares לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> to Laban הָאֲרַמִּ֑י <S%H761><s%> the Syrian עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in that בְּלִי֙ <S%H1097><s%> him not הִגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> he told ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בֹרֵ֖חַ <S%H1272><s%> that he fled הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <S%H1272><s%> So he fled הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֔וֹ וַיָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> with all that he had and he rose up וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנָּהָ֑ר <S%H5104><s%> the river וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> his face הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> [toward] the mount הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

וַיֻּגַּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לְלָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> Laban בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> on the third כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בָרַ֖ח <S%H1272><s%> was fled יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> that Jacob

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> his brethren עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וַיִּרְדֹּ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> with him and pursued אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> after him דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> journey שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days' וַיַּדְבֵּ֥ק <S%H1692><s%> and they overtook אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> him in the mount הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> came אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> And God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to לָבָ֥ן <S%H3837><s%> to Laban הָאֲרַמִּ֖י <S%H761><s%> the Syrian בַּחֲלֹ֣ם <S%H2472><s%> in a dream הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ הִשָּׁ֧מֶר <S%H8104><s%> unto him Take heed לְךָ֛ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תְּדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that thou speak עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> not to יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob מִטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> either good עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> or רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> bad

וַיַּשֵּׂ֥ג <S%H5381><s%> overtook לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> Then Laban אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וְיַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> Now Jacob תָּקַ֤ע <S%H8628><s%> had pitched אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אָהֳלוֹ֙ <S%H168><s%> his tent בָּהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount וְלָבָ֛ן <S%H3837><s%> and Laban תָּקַ֥ע <S%H8628><s%> pitched אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> with his brethren בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead
